Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Where do you want to put it?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Where do you want to retrieve it from?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>Are you sure you want to quit?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay then, let's have fun out
there!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can tend to them as usual, like
milking or shearing them.
<PAGE>
By having everyone tend to them, you
can get close to the animals more
quickly than usual.
<PAGE>
Also, the animals who are brought here
will <RED>no longer be stressed</RED> and should
be much healthier when they return.
<PAGE>
If you didn't bring any tools, just let
me know, and take what you need from the
tool box.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Push the X Button to open the menu and
you can choose the action you want!
<PAGE>
There are four actions: "Happy",
"Gesture", "Rub Eyes", and
"Fold Arms".
<PAGE>
One thing to remember: you cannot move
while taking an action.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Exchanged items are put into your bag
or inventory.
<PAGE>
Make sure you have room where you
keep items and objects, or you might be
<RED>unable to retrieve</RED> exchanged items!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After you talk to me, you'll be able
to disconnect by choosing <GREEN>Disconnect</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
Once you stop, you cannot restart, so
be sure to end all your actions with the
animals and other players.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are no items in your bag to
exchange. If you leave now, you won't be
able to continue playing, so be careful!
